full_summary:
Tender Notice for Modular General Purpose Shelter Systems

**Reference Number:** 106034.105-V2
**Publication Date:** 2023-05-10
**Tender Closing Date:** 2023-06-14T14:00:00

The Canadian Commercial Corporation (CCC), in conjunction with the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade, and Development (DFATD), invites prospective respondents to submit quotations for the supply and delivery of Modular General Purpose Shelter Systems.

**Delivery Details:**
- 40 units of HDT DRASH C-Series Shelter Model 4C or equivalent
- Deliverables to be completed by September 15, 2023

These goods are further described in Section A of the Request for Quotations (RFQ) Particulars (Appendix A) and the Statement of Requirements & Compliance Table (Appendix D).

**Request for Quotations Background:**

The CCC, under a Memorandum of Understanding with DFATD, will manage the supply of Deliverables and activities for the project. The CCC is a federal Crown corporation working in conjunction with DFATD to deliver in-kind contributions of goods and services to international governmental recipients.

**Important Notes:**

- This Request for Quotations cancels and supersedes the previous solicitation number 106034.105 (PW-23-01023844) issued January 30, 2023 with a closing of March 6, 2023.
- Amendment No. 3, Amendment No. 2, and Amendment No. 1 have been added to this Request for Quotations on June 1, 2023, May 24, 2023, and May 18, 2023, respectively.

**Attachments:**

Please find the attachments to this Request for Quotations at the following links:
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5368/106034.105-v2---rfq-niger-modular-shelter-system-en.pdf
https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/5368/106034.105-v2---addendum-no.-3---qa-no.3---2023-06-01_0.pdf
...and other relevant documents linked at the above locations.

**Contact Information:**

For any questions or concerns, please contact Kathee Nash at bids@ccc.ca or (343) 573-1229. The CCC will be pleased
